name: Query Rapid ILS Print Monos
query: SELECT DISTINCT split_part(identifiers.identifier, ' ', 1) AS isbn, instances.title AS title, items.effective_location_name AS location, items.effective_call_number AS call_number, pub.date_of_publication AS pub_date FROM folio_derived.instance_identifiers identifiers INNER JOIN folio_derived.instance_ext instances ON identifiers.instance_id = instances.instance_id INNER JOIN folio_inventory.holdings_record__t__ holdings ON instances.instance_id = holdings.instance_id INNER JOIN folio_derived.item_ext items ON holdings.id = items.holdings_record_id INNER JOIN folio_derived.instance_publication pub ON instances.instance_id = pub.instance_id WHERE identifiers.identifier_type_name = 'ISBN' AND instances.mode_of_issuance_name IN ('single unit', 'multipart monograph') AND items.material_type_name = 'unmediated -- volume' AND instances.type_name = 'text' AND instances.discovery_suppress = 'f' AND holdings.discovery_suppress = 'f' AND items.effective_location_name IN ('Evans stk') ORDER BY isbn, title, location, call_number
